Detailed Description

This class is used for logging the requests and replys in the module test server.

MultiThread safe.

void MTLog::putReply (  uint16  packID,
char *  str
) 
 

Add a reply to the list.

Prints the answer to file if possible and/or neccesary. The ownership of the string is transfered to <this>. Monitor procedure.
